channel.title: Changing Client Background Without Sprite Already There?
channel.description:
I'm kind of new at this, I was wondering how I would go about changing the background of the client.
It's a 317 Exion source, and it has the default runescape background. There are no sprites of any backgrounds previously created or anything, and I would really like to add my own. Any help is appreciated.
ALSO: I would really like to add music to the client, it's just that my signlink.java doesn't look anything like the ones in the tutorials for this look like. But I'll worry about that later I guess
